definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder
lit. both the palm and the back of the hand are made of flesh (idiom)/fig. to both be of equal importance/to value both equally
pinyin: shou3 xin1 shou3 bei4 dou1 shi4 rou4

sentences.english: He stiffened and wiped his face with the back of his hand.
sentences.chinese: 这时，他板起了面孔，用手背揩往了眼泪。

sentences.english: Sindu softened a bit and wiped her tears with the back of her hands.
sentences.chinese: 女儿的样子稍微好转了一点，用小手背擦了擦眼泪。

sentences.english: He drew the back of his hand across his nose with a conciliatory air.
sentences.chinese: 他显出一副息事求和的样子，用手背抹了一下鼻子。

sentences.english: The giant took a gulp of tea and wiped his mouth with the back of his hand.
sentences.chinese: 巨人喝了一大口茶，然后用手背抹了抹嘴。

sentences.english: The outside or back of the hand is sinewy, and has no specific designation.
sentences.chinese: 手背是强壮有力的，没有特定的名称。

sentences.english: He wiped his mouth with the back of his hand.
sentences.chinese: 巨人喝了一大口茶，然后用手背抹了抹嘴。

sentences.english: Neville leaned against the door frame for a moment and wiped his forehead with the back of his hand.
sentences.chinese: 纳威在门框上靠了一会儿，用手背擦了擦额头上的汗。

sentences.english: Mourngrym looked warily all around, hairs prickling on the backs of his hands.
sentences.chinese: 莫恩格林小心地环视四周，长发刺痛了手背。

sentences.english: Start again from the haunch and loose your hands to beat skin gently.
sentences.chinese: 再次从臀部开始，双手放松，用手背轻轻拍打皮肤。

sentences.english: I wiped my mouth with the back of my hand, swallowed, and walked toward her.
sentences.chinese: 我用手背擦了擦嘴，咽了一口唾沫，朝她走过去。

sentences.english: I know the area like the back of my hand.
sentences.chinese: 我很熟悉这片土地，就像熟悉我的手背一样。

sentences.english: Mother clucked her tongue and held the back of her hand to Hattie’s forehead.
sentences.chinese: 母亲哒哒地弹着舌，把手背贴放在海蒂的额头上。

sentences.english: He rubbed his forehead with the back of his hand.
Objective To explore the method of superficial vein turgidity in the dorsum of hand and increase the accuracy of venepuncture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨手背静脉充盈方法，提高静脉穿刺成功率。

definition: palm (of one's hand)/control (extended meaning from having something in the palm of one's hand)
the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
